snippet: Brook Lopez and Jarrett Jack each scored 26 points as the visiting Nets broke a seven-game losing streak with a 102-80 win over the Washington Wizards.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets defeat Washington Wizards, 102-80; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez and Jarrett Jack each scored 26 points as the visiting Nets broke a seven-game losing streak with a 102-80 win over the Washington Wizards.

headline.print_headline: Lopez Helps Nets Rout Wizards to Stop 7-Game Skid
headline.main: Lopez Helps Nets Rout Wizards to Stop 7-Game Skid
